title: [OffTopic] best things to do in campus as a fresher to make friends like clubs sports etc
content: Guys i am going to join pes without knowing a lot of people from there. So I want to figure out best clubs to meet new people. Also how does sports work in pes, will there be selections or is it like a club and a team is selected from it.

comments.body: Join whichever club intrigues you. Sport selections are there
You don't have to know anyone. You'll find your people
